. Busy Bee Studio

Let's create...

Welcome!

– About –

It’s so nice to see you here!
We are Busy Bee Studios, a creative center that get creative minds together. We offer classes and workshops every week in a very relaxed and friendly environment. Our aim is for everyone to learn new skills and technics while having fun. We have created a community of like-minded creators who enjoy chatting about their different project. We are very welcoming so don’t hesitate to pop in and join us.

Our Classes

– Details –

For everyone

Everyone is welcome, no matter your abilities we’ll make sure you have a good experience and go home with something you’ve created all by yourself.

Just Drop In

So this week you have the dance show of the little one and can’t attend a class ? No problem at all, we know how life is, that’s why all our classes are on a drop in base, priced individually. We also offer a card for 6 classes, to use on any of them, without any limit of time!

Materials ?

You don’t have to worry about any material, everything is provided for our classes so that you can just fsit back, relax, and focus on your masterpiece.

Our Studio

Our studio is based in Clevedon craft center. We have 3 airy rooms dedicated to our classes and workshops, as well as a lounge area where you can relax with a cup of tea and browse our library of books and magazines to find inspiration. In Summer, we install a few tables in our garden for you to chat about all those ideas buzzing in your head. Depending on the class or workshop and amount of people attending, we sometimes settle outside.
